Sentencas: Doped perovskite-type oxides have diversified applications in sensors, inorganic membranes, piezoelectricity, and solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Magnetic characteristics and FTIR bands of cerium doped perovskite-type (Ba0.5Sr0.5)(Fe1-xCex)O3-d (x=0-1.0) oxides

Sentencas: An attempt has been made here to synthesize (Ba0.5Sr0.5)(Fe1-xCex)O3-delta (x = 0 - 1.0) powders by decomposition of sol-gel derived oxalate at 750-950 ?degrees C for 5 h to study the effect of cerium insertion with regard to Fourier transform infrared (FTIR) bands and magnetic characteristics.
Titulo: Magnetic characteristics and FTIR bands of cerium doped perovskite-type (Ba0.5Sr0.5)(Fe1-xCex)O3-d (x=0-1.0) oxides

Sentencas: It is shown that the coercivity (H-c) increases from similar to 83.4 to 1985 Oe and saturation magnetization decreases from similar to 0.146 to 0.041 emu/g as structure changes from cubic (x = 0) to orthorhombic (x = 1.0).
Titulo: Magnetic characteristics and FTIR bands of cerium doped perovskite-type (Ba0.5Sr0.5)(Fe1-xCex)O3-d (x=0-1.0) oxides

Sentencas: The law of saturation approximation (LAS) agrees well with observed saturation magnetization.
Titulo: Magnetic characteristics and FTIR bands of cerium doped perovskite-type (Ba0.5Sr0.5)(Fe1-xCex)O3-d (x=0-1.0) oxides

Sentencas: The transition temperatures are found to be similar to 500, 370, and 370.12 K for x = 0, 0.6, and 1.0, respectively.
Titulo: Magnetic characteristics and FTIR bands of cerium doped perovskite-type (Ba0.5Sr0.5)(Fe1-xCex)O3-d (x=0-1.0) oxides

Sentencas: High coercivity (similar to 1985 Oe) and hysteresis in (Ba0.5Sr0.5) CeO3-delta (x = 1.0) arise due to the presence of oxygen vacancies and structural distortion.
Titulo: Magnetic characteristics and FTIR bands of cerium doped perovskite-type (Ba0.5Sr0.5)(Fe1-xCex)O3-d (x=0-1.0) oxides

Sentencas: FTIR spectra show different types of bands related to the iron and/or cerium-oxygen (i.e., Fe/Ce - O) stretching vibrations.
Titulo: Magnetic characteristics and FTIR bands of cerium doped perovskite-type (Ba0.5Sr0.5)(Fe1-xCex)O3-d (x=0-1.0) oxides

Sentencas: The redshift has been observed with cerium in (Ba0.5Sr0.5)(Fe1-xCex)O3-delta.
Titulo: Magnetic characteristics and FTIR bands of cerium doped perovskite-type (Ba0.5Sr0.5)(Fe1-xCex)O3-d (x=0-1.0) oxides

Sentencas: These properties make them useful in magnetic recording and storage applications.
Titulo: Magnetic characteristics and FTIR bands of cerium doped perovskite-type (Ba0.5Sr0.5)(Fe1-xCex)O3-d (x=0-1.0) oxides
